title: Laverne Cox looks sensational as she attends Casamigos' Halloween party
text:
She famously starred in Netflix series Orange Is The New Black.

And Laverne Cox ensured she was front and centre once again on Friday as she impressed at the annual Casamigos' Halloween party held at co-founder Mike Meldman's Beverly Hills home.

The film star, 47, donned a racy warrior-themed leotard with long black velvet gloves and an eye mask.

Looking good: Laverne Cox ensured she was front and centre once again on Friday as she impressed at the annual Casamigos' Halloween party held at co-founder Mike Meldman's Beverly Hills home

The low cut armour-style outfit showed off her assets while her gladiator footwear continued the battle theme.

The star's honey-hued tresses flowed in tousled curls and she carried a tiny shoulder bag to complete the stylish ensemble.

The actress was in the mood to mingle with other guests, who included Justin Timberlake, Paris Hilton and Ryan Phillipe.

Having the time of her life: The film star, 47, donned a racy warrior-themed leotard with long black velvet gloves and an eye mask

Meldman's home was decked out in a psychedelic theme, with a number of custom neon features and graffiti backdrop.

Guests were welcomed with a Casamigos ice shot and the crowd enjoyed signature cocktails including the Casa-delic, Magic Marg and Spicy Spirit.

Hosts Rande and Cindy showed off their best 60s and 70s-style looks, with the supermodel dressed in a colourful jumpsuit.

So much style: The low cut armour-style outfit showed off her assets while her gladiator footwear continued the battle theme

Having fun: The actress was in the mood to mingle with other guests, who included Justin Timberlake, Paris Hilton and Ryan Phillipe

Ready for action: The star's honey-hued tresses flowed in tousled curls and she carried a tiny shoulder bag

Rande was ready for a psychedelic 1960s concert in colourful butterfly-adorned pants and a leather waistcoat.

Cindy's luminous look was covered in strips of blue, green and yellow and decorated with gleaming sequins.

She accentuated her trim figure with a thick violet belt secured with a gold buckle, and her bell bottom pant legs culminated in a pair of open-toe heels.

Hosts with the most: Cindy Crawford, 53, and Rande Gerber, 57, wore their best 60s and 70s–style looks Friday night as they helped host the Casamigos Halloween party in Beverly Hills

Rande launched Casamigos tequila back in 2013 with his co-founders George Clooney and Mike Meldman.

Laverne's outing comes after she announced on Instagram earlier this month that she is single and ready for a new relationship.

The post came after she broke up in June with boyfriend of two years Kyle Draper.

Single lady: Laverne's outing comes after she announced on Instagram earlier this month that she is single and ready for a new relationship

She posted a video of herself as she seductively danced around to When in Rome by The Promise.

The 35-year-old stunned in a red backless one-piece swimsuit as she held an Opening Ceremony varsity jacket to her chest with a fan blowing through her hair.

She captioned the video: 'Single lady here. It's ok to slide into my DM's gentlemen. Don't be scared. Just be respectful. Los Angeles area preferred. Talk soon.'
